explanations.machine learning: The paper uses machine learning techniques, specifically long short-term memory networks and support vector machines, for financial time-series forecasting.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper involves supervised learning as it uses historical financial data to train models for forecasting asset returns.
explanations.deep learning: The paper employs deep learning methods, specifically long short-term memory networks, for financial time-series forecasting.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses neural networks, specifically long short-term memory networks, for forecasting asset returns.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper uses long short-term memory (LSTM) networks to capture long-term dependencies in financial time-series data and forecast asset returns.
explanations.LSTM: The paper uses LSTM networks as a key component of its methodology for financial time-series forecasting.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper compares the performance of LSTM networks against support vector machines (SVM) for financial time-series forecasting.
explanations.SVM: The paper mentions support vector machines (SVM) as one of the benchmark models compared against LSTM networks.
